author: wn.com
title: Housing Executive Need to Apologise Over Political Comments: Campbell (DUP - Democratic Unionist Party)
text: ( Source : DUP - Democratic Unionist Party ) DUP MP Gregory Campbell has written to the Chief Executive of the Housing Executive after a number of statements from NIHE spokespersons during interviews relating to a new mural unveiled last
